New Records: Kyle Mayers made his debut for the West Indies in this match, marking a new milestone for the team
Key Match Events: The West Indies almost achieved the target of 136 but fell short, ending on 135 for 8
Kyle Mayers contributed 35 off 34 balls, a notable performance in his debut
Roston Chase scored 52 and formed a crucial 81-run partnership with Kyle Mayers
Tabraiz Shamsi and Keshav Maharaj delivered strong bowling performances for South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase highlighted the need for the West Indies to improve their middle-order performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner of the match would join England in the semifinals of the T20 World Cup
